message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I can do a bit better than that, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. How about $115?
I'm still a bit higher than that. How about $105?
I can see you're a serious buyer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I'm still a bit away from $110. Can you do $108?
I can see you're getting close to your target price. How about we meet at $112?
I'm getting close, but I still need to save a bit more. Can you do $110?
I'm not going to go any lower than $112, but I'm willing to meet you at $111. That's as low as I can go.
I'm not sure I can go any lower than $110. That's my final offer.
